pli-tv-pvr1.5:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, in how many ways of the six kinds of origination of offenses do they originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:1.3: they originate by body and by mind, not by voice …
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.1: Of the six origins of offences by how many origins does the offence of easing oneself … out of disrespect originate?
pli-tv-pvr1.5:2.3: it originates by body and by mind, not by voice.
pli-tv-pvr1.5:3.1: Concluded is the Fifth Chapter: that on Origins
